name: Social Practice VR
description:
SPVR is a simulation game with the intent to immerse people into a social scenario so they can potentially practice and help improve their social anxiety or social skills. With the use of real a life location along with detailed human models we hope to provide an engaging experience.

Game Designer - Riley Peralta

Programmer - Maria Loza

Programmer - Theodore Ebenhoech

Required tools:

VR Headset with built in mic

internet connection

Leap Motion
